effect.full: This Pokémon cannot be burned. If a Pokémon is burned and acquires this ability, its burn is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

description.diamond-pearl: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
description.platinum: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
